text: Old Moat is an area and electoral ward of Manchester, England. It is represented in Westminster by Jeff Smith MP for Manchester Withington. The 2011 Census recorded a population of 14,490. == Councillors == Three councillors serve the ward: Garry Bridges (Lab), Gavin White (Lab), and Suzannah Reeves (Lab). {| class="wikitable" |-
